sql-select.name: GetObjectsWithFloatTypes
sql-select.description: Find all columns with the float data type
sql-select.sql-select-text:
SET NOCOUNT ON; SET DEADLOCK_PRIORITY LOW;
SELECT tSU.[name] AS [SchemaName] ,tSO.[name] AS [ObjectName] ,tSO.[xtype] AS [ObjectType] ,tSO.[crdate] AS [ObjectCreateDate] FROM [dbo].[sysobjects] tSO INNER JOIN [dbo].[sysusers] tSU ON tSU.[uid] = tSO.[uid] INNER JOIN [dbo].[syscolumns] AS tSC ON tSC.[id] = tSO.[id] INNER JOIN [dbo].[systypes] AS tST ON tST.[xusertype] = tSC.[xusertype] AND tST.[name] IN ( N'float' ,N'real' ) WHERE tSO.[xtype] IN ( N'U' ,N'V' ) AND OBJECTPROPERTY(tSO.[id], N'IsMSShipped') = 0 GROUP BY tSU.[name] ,tSO.[name] ,tSO.[xtype] ,tSO.[crdate] ORDER BY tSU.[name] ,tSO.[name] ;

SET NOCOUNT ON; SET DEADLOCK_PRIORITY LOW;
SELECT tSS.[name] AS [SchemaName] ,tSO.[name] AS [ObjectName] ,tSO.[type_desc] AS [ObjectType] ,tSO.[create_date] AS [ObjectCreateDate] FROM [sys].[objects] tSO INNER JOIN [sys].[schemas] tSS ON tSS.[schema_id] = tSO.[schema_id] INNER JOIN [sys].[columns] AS tSC ON tSC.[object_id] = tSO.[object_id] INNER JOIN [sys].[types] AS tST ON tST.[user_type_id] = tSC.[user_type_id] AND tST.[name] IN ( N'float' ,N'real' ) WHERE tSO.[type_desc] IN ( N'USER_TABLE' ,N'VIEW' ) AND OBJECTPROPERTY(tSO.[object_id], N'IsMSShipped') = 0 GROUP BY tSS.[name] ,tSO.[name] ,tSO.[type_desc] ,tSO.[create_date] ORDER BY tSS.[name] ,tSO.[name] ;
